DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Gathering information breast cancer survivor lymphedema ; symptom impact shoulder , arm , hand functioning ; quality life may help doctor learn disease . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study impact lymphedema breast cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Lymphedema Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine relationship degree lymphedema , lymphedema-associated symptom , local upper extremity functioning . - To determine relationship degree lymphedema , lymphedema-associated symptom , local upper extremity functioning , overall health-related functioning . - To determine relationship degree lymphedema , lymphedema-associated symptom , local upper extremity functioning , overall health-related functioning , quality life . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord presence lymphedema ( yes v ) . Patients complete self-reporting questionnaire assess degree lymphedema use Norman Questionnaire Jane M. Armer 's Lymphedema Breast Cancer Questionnaire ; lymphedema-associated symptom use Symptoms Affected Breast/Mastectomy site questionnaire , Symptoms Shoulder , Arm , Hand Affected Side questionnaire , General Symptom Experience questionnaire ; local upper extremity function use hand dominance questionnaire Disabilities Arm , Shoulder , Hand ( DASH ) questionnaire ; quality life ( QOL ) use Multidimensional QOL Scale ; comorbidity use Charleston Comorbidity Scale . Patients undergo 3.5-hour test assess degree lymphedema arm circumference bioimpedance spectroscopy ( BIS ) ; local upper extremity function strength testing , range movement neurodynamic test use goniometer , skin examination , skin sensation sensation scar use Semmes-Weinstein Monofilament test , fine motor control/finger coordination use Purdue Pegboard , Finger Tapper , Vibration Threshold ; overall health-related functioning use graded exercise test .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis breast cancer No breast cancer side No recurrence breast cancer ( local distant ) Completed active treatment breast cancer ( i.e. , surgery and/or radiotherapy and/or chemotherapy ) â‰¥ 6 month No prior contralateral bilateral mastectomy No preexisting lymphedema prior breast cancer diagnosis Hormone receptor status specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Menopausal status specify Weight < 300 pound Mentally physically able participate No current infection lymphangitis involve affect arm No preexisting neuromuscular condition would affect local upper extremity overall healthrelated function No contraindication bioimpedance spectroscopy ( BIS ) testing , include application electrode adhesive pad skin ( i.e. , unable lie supine , allergy electrode adhesive pad , sunburn , open wound ) No contraindication exercise test outline American Heart Association American College Sports Medicine PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
